name: Detective Leapfrog (by Team 3)
description:
A dark gritty noir game parody involving frogs, bad jokes and references to classic detective media.  

The objective of the game will be to navigate the world in platforming segments, making use of the walljump feature to look for clues and find witnesses to find out what's really going on in the shady underbelly of the swamp.

Currently we've only created placeholder assets and splashscreens but we intend to make everything hand-drawn like it is, just less ugly.   The systems are all in place to continually add more characters, props etc. but for now we just have the one badly crafted level as a test area kinda thing.

Controls:

A,D - Left/Right

W - Small Jump

Hold space - charge up leap/grab walls

Release space - use charged leap

E/Enter - interact
